events.event_name: Costa Rica Q4 2025 Labor Market Data Release
events.description: The release of unemployment and employment statistics for Costa Rica for the fourth quarter of 2025.

facts.fact_text: The unemployment rate in Costa Rica fell to 6.3% in the fourth quarter of 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: The unemployment rate in Costa Rica fell to 6.3% in the fourth quarter of 2025, down from 6.9% in the same period a year earlier.

facts.fact_text: The number of unemployed individuals in Costa Rica decreased to 147.5 thousand.

evidences.evidence_text: The number of unemployed individuals declined by 17.7 thousand to 147.5 thousand.

facts.fact_text: The employment rate in Costa Rica decreased to 51.1%.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, the employment rate edged down to 51.1% from 52.8%, as the number of employed individuals decreased by 47.9 thousand to 2.18 million.

facts.fact_text: The labor force participation rate in Costa Rica declined to 54.5%.

evidences.evidence_text: At the same time, the labor force participation rate declined to 54.5%, down from 56.7%.

links.source_ref: Costa Rica Q4 2025 Labor Market Data Release

evidence.evidence_text: Costa Rica Jobless Rate Drops to 6.3% in Q4
At the same time, the labor force participation rate declined to 54.5%, down from 56.7%.
the employment rate edged down to 51.1% from 52.8%, as the number of employed individuals decreased by 47.9 thousand to 2.18 million.
